file1.location: starts with platform, then to the rest of the structure
file1.appends: Optional, left blank won't append to any files. wepChache prechaches the filename in _mapspawn.gnut. custom uses the custom field, multi uses the custom field, with custom1, custom2, etc, follows custom structure

custom.name: name of the file to append to
custom.location: starts with platform, then to the rest of the structure
